content: नूनं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Certainly, assuredly, surely, verily, indeed; अद्यापि नूनं हरकोपवह्निस्त्वयि ज्वलत्यौर्व इवांबुराशौ <ls>Ś. 3. 3</ls>; <ls>Me. 9</ls>, <ls n="Me.">18</ls>, <ls n="Me.">46</ls>; <ls>Bh. 1. 11</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 12</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">5. 75</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 29.</ls> {@--2@} Most probably, in all probability. <ls>U. 4. 23.</ls> {@--3@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Now; just now, just. {@--4@} Immediately. {@--5@} In future. {@--6@} Now then, therefore.
